name: Wraith King
title: Ostarion
lore: For untold years, King Ostarion built his empire by battering his enemies with his massive mace.

wraithfireBlast.name: Wraithfire Blast
wraithfireBlast.description: Hurls a spectral blast that stuns, then slows and damages the target over time.

vampiricSpirit.name: Vampiric Spirit
vampiricSpirit.description: Wraith King and nearby allies gain lifesteal. Summons skeletons on kills.

mortalStrike.name: Mortal Strike
mortalStrike.description: Wraith King has a chance to deal critical damage with each attack.

reincarnation.name: Reincarnation
reincarnation.description: Wraith King returns to life with full HP after dying, slowing nearby enemies.
